title: Benoit Richaud on choreography, feelings, music, and figure skating
description:
French choreographer Benoit Richaud works with some of the best figure skaters in the world to shape their ideas into medal winning performances.

Olympic bronze medallist Daisuke Takahashi, 2019 Grand Prix Final winner Rika Kihira, and U.S. national champion Bradie Tennell are just three of many skaters who have benefitted from his advice.

He outlines his life and philosophy in an in-depth interview about artistry, music, why you should listen to your feelings, Beijing 2022, and how he's adapted to 2020's challenges.
